snippet: The Oratory Church of St. Boniface, in Brooklyn, is an intentional parish, a destination church that attracts people from beyond its geographic boundaries.
abstract: Oratory Church of St Boniface in Downtown Brooklyn espouses an open and inclusive approach to worship and attracts a diverse crowd of followers who travel beyond their own neighborhoods and boroughs to attend; church represents new generation of Catholics who are actively choosing parishes where they feel affirmed, rather than attending their local church.
lead_paragraph: The Oratory Church of St. Boniface, in Brooklyn, is an intentional parish, a destination church that attracts people from beyond its geographic boundaries.

headline.seo: Oratory Church of St. Boniface Draws Congregants From Outside the Parish

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Oratory Church of St Boniface (Brooklyn, NY)
